phase3.listeners.PixelClickListener



interface PixelClickListener;
The PixelClickListener is fired whenever a pixel in an ImageCanvas is clicked on.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 20, 2014

abstract void onPixelClick(int x, int y);
Called when a pixel is clicked.

Params:
int x The x-coordinate of the clicked pixel.
int y The y-coordinate of the clicked pixel.

Date:
April 20, 2014
